column2: Domino's Pizza will have to raise wages to stay competitive - CEO April 6 Domino's Pizza Inc will need to raise the minimum wage to get the "right people" to stay competitive

column5: in a dispute over a factory in the foothills of the Himalayas

column2: States ask U.S. Congress to launch inquiry of herbal supplements NEW YORK A group of 14 state attorneys general on Thursday asked the U.S. Congress to investigate the herbal supplements industry after a New York probe of the products turned up ingredients that were not listed on labels and raised safety concerns.

column2: Viacom to reorganize three domestic network groups to drive growth April 6 Media company Viacom Inc said it will reorganize three of its domestic network groups into two new organizations as part of a restructuring to drive growth.

States ask U.S. Congress to launch inquiry of herbal supplements NEW YORK A group of 14 state attorneys general on Thursday asked the U.S. Congress to investigate the herbal supplements industry after a New York probe of the products turned up ingredients that were not listed on labels and raised safety concerns.
